column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: The monthly report from the Department of Police
column4: Traffic Police and Public Order of the National Police Commissariat stated that over the 28 days of February car accidents have killed 162 people and injured 560 in 362 reported cases. This is an increase of 12.5%
column5: not counting the 3 fewer days in the month.------Chinese New Year------ is a major factor in the numbers of road accidents and fatalities.------The ------January report------ stated that a total of 144 people were killed and 509 wounded from 322 reported accidents over 31 days where there were casualties.
